sentences: Arvid Wam Solvang (born July 14, 1969) is a Norwegian songwriter/producer living in Oslo, Norway.
Arvid Wam Solvang was born July 14, 1969, in Kopervik, Norway.
After touring Norway for years as a guitarist with a range of different bands, he started a music production company called Viagram.
2007 Vidar Johnsen og Peter Nordberg - Ord och ögonblick
2008 Vidar Johnsen og Peter Nordberg - Mål & Mening
2009 Vidar Johnsen og Peter Nordberg - I Ild Og Vatten
